DataElement.preferredName: Breast Problem Awareness Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free-text field to capture another means by which a breast symptom was noticed by the patient that is not already specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved._Knowing that something exists, or having knowledge or experience of a particular thing; having special interest in or experience of something and so being well informed of what is happening in that subject at the present time.
